name: Breakdance
description:
Chillin out maxin relaxin all cool. Screen-printed on Black, 100% fine jersey cotton, sweatshop free American Apparel.

Shipping

* This item may be back ordered All orders are shipped by USPS 4-14 days (7-14 outside of the United States)

Care for the Bear

Before washing, flip your Bear Annihilator shirt inside out, wash with cold water and let it hang dry.
